data.title: The Buhl Foundation
data.meta_description: A foundation in Pittsburgh, PA that operates to create community legacies by leveraging its resources to encourage people and organizations to dream, to innovate and to take action.
data.text:
It is the mission of the Buhl Foundation to create community legacies by leveraging its resources to encourage people and organizations to dream, to innovate and to take action.

Throughout its long history, The Buhl Foundation has taken a fair and equitable approach to grantmaking and has sought to ensure that its grantees are reflective of the community and the population that it serves.
